title: Don't call to close in FingersCrossedHandler and GroupHandler of their handlers
body:
Currently the method close is not being called from `FingersCrossedHandler` ðŸ‘‰ [link](https://github.com/Seldaek/monolog/blob/21dde4dedbbbefe3f8055ce5c1d4aaf8516d9ec6/src/Monolog/Handler/FingersCrossedHandler.php#L131-L143) and it doesn't exist in `GroupHandler` ðŸ‘‰ [link](https://github.com/Seldaek/monolog/blob/21dde4dedbbbefe3f8055ce5c1d4aaf8516d9ec6/src/Monolog/Handler/GroupHandler.php)

For example, with a configuration:

``` yml
monolog:
    main:
            type:         fingers_crossed
            action_level: error
            handler:      group
    group:
            type: group
            members:
                - rollbar
                - file
    rollbar:
            type: rollbar
            level: info
            token: "%rollbar_token%"
            formatter: monolog.formatter.json
    file:
            type:  stream
            path:  "%kernel.logs_dir%/%kernel.environment%.log"
            level: debug
```

When there is a `Fatal Error`, it is not sent to Rollbar because they are sent in close method of `RollbarHandler` (https://github.com/Seldaek/monolog/blob/96f4fd718f8a547f5c5eeadf06383f097f4e3c08/src/Monolog/Handler/RollbarHandler.php#L111-L116)

Related: https://github.com/Seldaek/monolog/commit/2525053e8ef01d7fe703e58aba5300e7881f9fc6

I'm working in a PR...
